data.taskTitle: Right-click context menu for standalone tasks
summary: Added right-click context menu to task rows in TasksOpen.svelte
Menu items: Launch, View Details, Change Status (submenu with colored dots), Assign to Epic (submenu with lazy-loaded epics), Duplicate, Close Task
Styled to match FileTree context menu aesthetic (oklch dark theme, 0.5rem border-radius, contextMenuIn animation)
Submenus use position: absolute with flyout to the right
Click-outside and Escape key dismiss the menu
All actions use existing API endpoints (PUT /api/tasks/[id], POST /api/tasks/[id]/epic, POST /api/tasks)
Added right-click context menu to TasksOpen.svelte with Launch, View Details, Change Status, Assign to Epic, Duplicate actions
Added right-click context menu to TasksActive.svelte with View Details, Attach Terminal, Change Status, Duplicate, Interrupt, Pause, Complete, Close & Kill actions
Fixed 2-3 second paint delay by using CSS visibility toggle instead of Svelte conditional rendering
Context menu also works on expanded terminal/session area in TasksActive
